about_page.title: Welcome to iBOS
about_page.subtitle: About Us ‚Äì iBOS Academy
about_page.text1: At iBOS Academy, we believe the human mind has no limits. With the power of technology and innovation, we open doors to new opportunities and smart solutions that shape the future.
about_page.text2: Located in the heart of Andijon, iBOS Academy is more than just an IT education center ‚Äî it‚Äôs a hub of innovation, research, and creativity. Our mission is to empower young minds and professionals with the skills they need to thrive in the ever-evolving world of IT, Artificial Intelligence, Robotics, Hardware Engineering, and 3D Modeling.
about_page.point1: üåü Diverse Learning Paths: From Backend Development to AI Agents, Robototexnika, and Hardware Engineering, we provide practical, industry-ready skills.
about_page.point2: üî¨ R&D Laboratory: A space for innovation ‚Äî where students bring ideas to life through projects like Smart Greenhouse, Smart Homes, IoT solutions, and even defense technology prototypes.
